original_text: But they that escape of them shall escape, and shall be on the mountains like doves of the valleys, all of them mourning, every one for his iniquity.
korean_text: 도망하는 자는 산 위로 피하여 다 각기 자기 죄악 때문에 골짜기의 비둘기들처럼 슬피 울 것이며

sentences.original_text: But they that escape of them shall escape
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들 중 도피하는 자들은 도피할 것이요

sentences.original_text: and shall be on the mountains
